abilities.name: Witch Rondo
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, your opponent switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
